xmlText.p: LONG ISLAND DUCKS — Sign OF Daniel Fields.
LAKE ERIE CRUSHERS — Signed RHP Payton Lobdell to a contract extension.
NORMAL CORNBELTERS — Signed C Cody Erickson.
SCHAUMBURG BOOMERS — Signed UTL Lucas Owens. Released RHP Brandon Quintero.
WASHINGTON WILD THINGS — Signed C Babe Thomas.
CHICAGO BULLS — Signed F Jarell Eddie to a 10-day contract.
CLEVELAND CAVALIERS — Suspended G J.R. Smith one game for detrimental conduct.
EDMONTON ESKIMOS — Announced the retirement of OL D'Anthony Batiste.
ARIZONA COYOTES — Recalled F Laurent Dauphin from Tucson (AHL). Signed F Brayden Burke to a three-year contract.
COLORADO AVALANCHE — Reassigned D David Warsofsky to San Antonio (AHL).
LOS ANGELES KINGS — Signed F Gabe Vilardi to a three-year contract.
NEW JERSEY DEVILS — Assigned G Eddie Lack to Binghamton (AHL). Activated G Cory Schneider off injured reserve.
TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING — Signed F Alex Barre-Boulet to a three-year entry level contract. Recalled F Anthony Cirelli from Syracuse (AHL).
AHL — Suspended San Diego D Korbinian Holzer one game for an illegal check to the head of an opponent in a Feb. 27 game against San Antonio.
HARTFORD WOLF PACK — Signed G Charles Williams to a professional tryout agreement.
READING ROYALS — Signed D Kyle Chatham.
WORCESTER RAILERS — Acquired G William King from the Brampton.
LA GALAXY — Signed G Justin Vom Steeg.
MINNESOTA UNITED — Promoted Stacey Hardin to athletic trainer.
PORTLAND TIMBERS — Waived D Chance Myers.
MUHLENBERG — Announced Corey Goff executive director of athletics and recreation will leave at the end of the 2017-18 school year.
NEW JERSEY CITY — Announced the retirement of director of athletics Alice De Fazio. Named Ken Heaton interim director of athletics.
NORTH CAROLINA — Named Henry Baker an assistant football coach. Announced suspended G Jalek Felton has withdrawn from school.
STOCKTON — Announced the retirement of women's basketball coach Joe Fussner, effective June 30.

TUSCULUM — Announced the resignation of men's and women's golf coach Adam Buie. Announced director of athletic marketing and promotions Nick Forsberg, will serve as interim golf coach for the remainder of the spring season.
